alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 5:50PM CDT until May 15 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Le Flore County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 549 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bokoshe, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Poteau... Heavener... Panama... Wister... Howe... Fanshawe... Heavener Runestone State Park... Lake Wister State Park... Shady Point... Hodgen... Summerfield... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
